description:
Ottawa Dental Laboratory Inc. is a family oriented full service lab, we are looking to hire a ceramist with extensive experience in anterior cases to join our growing lab. this position is for Canadian technicians only; citizens or residents, applications from over seas will not be considered. Pay will be based on experience and quality, relocation/signing bonus. Please send pictures of your cases if possible to info@ottawadentallaboratory.com
Job Type: Full-time
Benefits:

 Dental care
 Life insurance
 Paid time off
 Relocation assistance
 Vision care

Schedule:

 Monday to Friday

Supplemental pay types:

 Bonus pay

Work Location: In person
